entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 19 March 2023
